name: @tf/oracles-harness
description: Harness for executing TF-Lang oracles and emitting deterministic reports.

scripts.build-reports: pnpm --reporter=append-only --filter @tf/oracles-core build && pnpm --reporter=append-only --filter @tf/oracles-idempotence build && pnpm --reporter=append-only --filter @tf/oracles-conservation build && pnpm --reporter=append-only --filter @tf-lang/utils build && pnpm build && node dist/index.js
